ygData.subject: Re: Staff of the Wheel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I got my staff yesterday (at level 29, maybe the youngest ever :) ) and I had no problems combining. I also had no problems combining the Jeweled
ygData.messageBody:
Don Taber wrote:
>
> From: Don Taber <dtaber@...>
>
> Late last night I finally got the 10th and final rod for the quest.
> Which means tonight I make the trek to Everfrost to get the container.
> Now I have heard that it is easy to fail at combining the rods, so what
> is the best way to succeed? Should I borrow a friends wisdom items?
> Should I dump more training points into research (is this the right
> skill)? Any help would be appreciated.
>
> I'm currently a 40th level human wizard.
>

Well, I got my staff yesterday (at level 29, maybe the youngest ever :)
) and I had no problems combining. I also had no problems combining the
Jeweled Skull back when I did. I am fairly certain that for quests, it
will always work. Have you ever heard of someone failing to combine a
quest item?

--
Sergey

P.S. If you're on Solusek Ro and want to trade me something for the
Jeweled Skull, e-mail me, or send a tell to Qenelin in game.
